messages.subject: Best Christmas ever
messages.msgSnippet: I had to work last night, but when I got home, we opened gifts.  It was the best ever.  Nobody was tired, nobody was whiny.  Everyone had a wonderful time.
messages.messageBody:
I had to work last night, but when I got home, we opened gifts. It was the best ever. Nobody was tired, nobody was whiny. Everyone had a wonderful time.

Never again will we do early morning!!!!

Kristen, the night owl with 3 kids who are night owls!!
****************************************************************

Today is even more important than tomorrow because "today" is a gift, and "tomorrow" might never come.

Today is where hope lives because today is when we can make things better than yesterday.

The only thing we can be sure of is today and life isn't worth living if it isn't lived in joy for as many moments of today as we can manage.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
